Thank you so much!

A few issues though, the mouse doesn't stay in the middle of the screen when in first person or looking around with right click (still better than the windows app though)

Also, wine keeps saying Roblox Studio has encountered a serious problem. Please fix this.

Otherwise,
great job!

description:
Pros: Can play roblox using it. That's an easy 4 stars.

Cons: The lag, mainly. I've noticed that it's more prevalent in shooters than anywhere else. It's also not the game optimization as it affects a wide variety of game. Many roblox games that run fine on worse computers now slog along at 10 FPS. 

I'll give it 5 stars once the lag is fixed. Until then, stick to playing more relaxing games.
Use grapejuice as there is less lag.

The developers really worked hard on this! It is way better than Grapejuice. It launches fast, automatically unlocks the 60 FPS cap and has many features! I would highly suggest using Vinegar instead of Grapejuice. Grapejuice is good, but has some issues and bugs.
summary: Amazing! Makes roblox on linux work like a breeze!

description: Since grapjuice stopped working i started using this and it works fine not as good as grapjuice but fine.

Pros: Plays Roblox without being such a resource hog, allows for good frames on high graphics.

Cons: Ping is horrible using this, Makes some buttons push twice, games that are usually very light end up taking a lot of power.

If a lot of these get fixed I'll give it 5 stars. (mainly the ping)

This wrapper has made running Roblox on Linux incredibly easy, like, I didn't think I'd be able to run Roblox on Linux after Roblox implemented Byfron.

But somehow this thing pulls it off MOSTLY flawlessly.

From my experience, if you run a very graphically demanding Roblox experience (i.e: Twisted, nico's nextbots, ect...) with a GPU that doesn't have too much power left over. Roblox will sometimes tank in FPS or hitch on some occasions. It's not game breaking at all though.

I also have one more thing with this wrapper. Theres no sort of GUI or easy way to modify Vinegar or enable certain things. (mainly bringing back the framerate counter)

Overall though, this is amazing! I'd recommend this to anyone wanting to play Roblox on Linux!
summary: I love it! Could use some small tweaks though

description:
We are sorry to announce, but due to bankupt and over 10,000 inappropriate content, we have no choice, but to shut down all game servers.

Thank you for playing our game on this wonderful adventure, but this has come to an end. All purchases will bee refunded. We hope to see you again soon! Move on Robloxians...
Better performance and a simpler method of just playing the game.

I mean it works. Runs quite well actually. Only complaint is the framerate is unlocked by default and gamescope can't re-lock it. You have to manually edit a file and set the framerate back to 60. This is bad especially on portable devies because it uses more battery than nessecary and it makes it get very hot.

Another issues is it doesn't show the cursor when using a controller, but this is a Roblox issue and happens on both macOS and Windows aswell. Nothing the Vinegar developers can do about it.
Turning the camera causes multiple seconds of input lag, fps doesnt even drop
summary: Too much input lag to be playable
